articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Rungna People's Pleasure Ground
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Rungna People's Pleasure Ground 
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Rungna People's Pleasure Ground just before the start of operation. 
					 His first leg was a mini golf course. 
					
					 He said the mini golf course was built to match well with the landscape of Rungna Islet. 
					
					 He stressed the need to plant a lot of trees there for shades for those enjoying golf in summer. 
					
					 Then he went to the Rungna Wading Pool.
					
					 He expressed satisfaction over the whole atmosphere of the wading pool created in clean and refreshing condition with all kinds of facilities and surroundings being white, blue and green. 
					
					 Going around basketball, volleyball and sandy volleyball courts built on the roof of the bathing booth and shower room, he said with great satisfaction that the builders used spaces in a reasonable way and that the surroundings of the wading pool underwent a cataclysmic change. 
					
					 He underscored the need to equip the wading pool with a first-aid room, watching stand and other things necessary for rescue. 
					
					 The Rungna Wading Pool, built in an exemplary way, goes well with the name of people's pleasure ground, he said, calling for building such wading pools in local cities. 
					
					 He repeatedly appreciated servicepersons for building a perfect wading pool. 
					
					 Next he went to the Rungna Dolphinarium.
					
					 He dropped in at the soft-drink stand and souvenir stand to learn about the service program there. 
					
					 Going around the room for scientific and technological knowledge, he called for providing the room with more things needed to give wide knowledge of the sea. 
					
					 He then enjoyed such feats of dolphins as dancing in rotation, moving backward, jumping out and touching ball in the air. 
					
					 He said that the Rungna People's Pleasure Ground is one of the projects leader Kim Jong Il was specially interested in. 
					
					 Had Kim Jong Il seen the completed project, he would have been greatly pleased, Kim Jong Un said. 
					
					 Now edifices like the Rungna People's Pleasure Ground are appearing one after another in Pyongyang, he said, underscoring the need to build more edifices suitable for the sentiment and aesthetic desire of our people with the pleasure ground as an example.  
					
					 He was accompanied with Jang Song Thaek, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ri Jae Il, Kim Pyong Ho and Pak Chun Hong.

articles.title: Talks between Security Delegations of DPRK, China Held
articles.content:
Talks between Security Delegations of DPRK, China Held 
 Beijing, July 24 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between delegations of the DPRK Ministry of People's Security and the Ministry of Public Security of China in Beijing on Tuesday. 
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were the visiting delegation of the Ministry of People's Security led by Minister Ri Myong Su and DPRK Ambassador to China Ji Jae Ryong and from the Chinese side the delegation of the Ministry of Public Security led by Minister Meng Jianzhu and officials concerned. 
					
					 At the talks Meng Jianzhu asked Ri Myong Su to convey warm greetings of the Chinese party, government, people and security officials to Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party, army and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 Recalling with deep emotion that general secretary Kim Jong Il met him during his visit to the DPRK last year, Meng said he is yearning for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il always lives in minds of both Korean and Chinese people for his great exploits performed for socialist construction of Korea and the development of the Sino-DPRK friendship, he stressed. 
					
					 He extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on receiving the title of DPRK Marshal. 
					
					 He expressed the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would further develop on good terms under the care of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The talks proceeded in a cordial atmosphere. Both sides discussed further developing cooperation between the security organs of the two countries and exchanged views of matters of mutual concern.

articles.title: China Will Boost Friendship with DPRK: Senior Chinese Official
articles.content:
China Will Boost Friendship with DPRK: Senior Chinese Official
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Zhou Yongkang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, met with the visiting delegation of the DPRK Ministry of People's Security led by Minister Ri Myong Su at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing on Tuesday. The delegation paid a courtesy call on Zhou.
					 Present at the meeting were Meng Jianzhu, minister of Public Security, and other Chinese officials of the ministries of Public Security and Foreign Affairs and DPRK Ambassador to China Ji Jae Ryong.
					
					 Zhou recollected with emotion the celebrations for the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea in 2010 where he was honored to meet with leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He expressed the ardent yearning for Kim Jong Il, saying he was a great leader of the Korean people and a close friend of Chinese people. 
					
					 The Chinese party and government are pleased to see the Korean people getting united and making great achievements in economic construction under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and the WPK, he said, convincing that the Korean people would achieve greater success in building a thriving nation.
					
					 He voiced the will to boost bilateral friendship in political, economic, cultural and all other fields.
					
					 Saying that Kim Jong Il's visits to China played a decisive role in developing the Sino-DPRK friendship, he expected wide-ranging visits and exchange would be continued in the future, too. 
					
					 Referring to cooperation between the security organs of the two countries, he expressed conviction that the visit of the delegation would make a positive contribution to developing the Sino-DPRK relations.

articles.title: Director of KPA General Political Bureau Learns about Construction of Pyongyang Folk Park
articles.content:
Director of KPA General Political Bureau Learns about Construction of Pyongyang Folk Park 
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, learned about the construction of the Pyongyang Folk Park nearing its completion.  
					 The soldier-builders have carried on dynamic struggle to build the park as a grand edifice in the Songun era, true to Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un's noble outlook on the people.
					
					 The director of the KPA General Political Bureau looked round various places of the park and praised the soldier-builders who performed great feats in the project.
					
					 He underscored the need for the soldier-builders to devotedly carry out the militant tasks given by the Supreme Commander and finish the construction within the fixed date.
					
					 Earlier, he went to the Academy of Agriculture Science and discussed the ways for increasing the utility rate of methane producing facilities and the problems arising in tapping renewable energy resources.

articles.title: Greetings from Lao President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a message of greeting from Choummaly Sayasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, president of the People's Democratic Republic of Laos and Chairman of the Central Committee of Defence and Security of the People's Democratic Republic of Laos, on July 20.
					 The message said as follows:
					
					 I extend warm congratulation from the bottom of my heart to you on your holding of the title of Marshal of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 The title is an expression of implicit trust in you of the party, government and people of the DPRK.
					
					 I believe that the DPRK government and people will gain a fresh and greater success in the accomplishment of the cause for building a thriving socialist nation under the outstanding and wise leadership of the WPK headed by you.
					
					 I hope that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between Laos and the DPRK will further develop in favor of the two people's interests.
					
					 I wish you good health and happiness as well as success in accomplishing the noble cause.

articles.title: Congratulations from Russian Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulations from Russian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a congratulatory message from V.V. Zhirinovsky, chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, on July 19.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend warm congratulations to you on holding the high title of Marshal of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 I sincerely wish you success in your work to bolster defence capability of the DPRK for ensuring peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and the Asian Continent.
					
					 Please accept my deep respect.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Double-Standards Are Not Acceptable in Punishing Terrorists
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Double-Standards Are Not Acceptable in Punishing Terrorists 
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean regime are pretending ignorance of the recent attempted state-sponsored terrorist act which stunned the world. But liars have short wings.
					 Persons involved in the heinous politically-motivated case testified to the fact that it was committed under the U.S. aid and with its final approval.
					
					 The U.S. instigated south Korean intelligence agencies to let human scum form a organization for demolishing statues in the DPRK. It was deeply involved in the whole course of the case while offering them a large amount of money and subversion and sabotage means and even examining and approving the plan.
					
					 It is needless to say that those devoid of elementary morality and conscience can not dare commit so a monstrous "undertaking".
					
					 The international community was so shocked to find that the U.S. manipulated the terrorist case directly linked with the supreme dignity of a sovereign state despite its loud call for combating terrorism. According to data available, a meeting for U.S. special operations is a regular happening in Florida State. At a recent meeting, a brigadier general of the U.S. Army referred to the importance of spy activities in the DPRK. He said U.S. special units have already kicked off collecting information in the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. Department of Defense organized a secret action unit called the defense secret department at the Defense Intelligence Agency, intensifying information collection outside war zones. This organization preferentially aims at such countries as the DPRK, Iran and China. 
					
					 An official of the U.S. Department of Defense said that the new organization is aimed at letting agents hold right posts in cooperation with the Central Intelligence Agency and collect necessary information. This is not so surprising news.
					
					 Information collection by U.S. special units in the DPRK was exposed by the action program of the U.S. Department of Defense which was opened to the public several years ago. The U.S. has prepared "conflict" in such a way as rallying agents near the border areas of the DPRK and spreading rumors there to create confusion.
					
					 The U.S. set a special item in the national budget every year and has escalated psychological warfare against the DPRK and operations for undermining it while providing a fabulous amount of funds to anti-DPRK plot-breeding organizations. 
					
					 The recent attempted terrorist act was a violation of international law, which was committed on the line of their extension.
					
					 Included in the International Anti-terrorism Law are regional conventions on ban of terrorist acts and punishment of terrorists, international convention on prohibition of terrorism by explosives and international convention on banning provision of funds for terrorism. Mentioned in the conventions are violence or threat by violence of life and health of state leaders, government officials and public figures, acts of destroying and disturbing state public properties and use of firepower weapons, explosives and poison for indiscriminative violence, forms of international terrorism. Such acts are bound to be strictly punished as they are international terrorist crimes, and no statute of limitations is applicable to criminals.
					
					 The U.S. should meet the demand of the International Anti-terrorism Law. It can never evade the responsibility for the recent case. It should admit the gravity of the heinous politically-motivated, state-sponsored terrorist act against the DPRK as it acted a back-stage manipulator and make an official apology to the DPRK. The U.S. should punish felons responsible for the terrorist acts.
					
					 If the U.S. applies two separate standards regarding the punishment of terrorists, it will result in fuelling terrorism, plunging the U.S. mainland into uneasiness and wrecking world peace.

articles.title: Minju Joson Japan's Shameless Attitude Regarding Comfort Women Issue Accused
articles.content:
Minju Joson Japan's Shameless Attitude Regarding Comfort Women Issue Accused 
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, when receiving a report about information on the sexual slavery for the imperial Japanese army against Korean women, the secretary of the U.S. Department of State said that the expression of "comfortable women for Japanese army" is wrong. She said it should be called "forcible 'sexual slavery' for Japanese army". Following this, the deputy spokesman for the U.S. Department of State made clear the official stand of the U.S. government seeing it as a serious human rights abuse.
					 When the sexual slavery-related remarks by the U.S. secretary of State were opened to the public, Japanese Foreign Minister Genba went busy, confirming it and calling for lodging a protest with the U.S. government.
					
					 Minju Joson says in a bylined commentary Tuesday in this regard:
					
					 This act can be done by a despicable person whose appearance as human being can hardly be found.
					
					 The Japanese army took away 200,000 Korean women as sexual slaves and ruthlessly violated their bodies and dignity. This was the greatest tragic story in the 20th century which was clearly disclosed by testimonies of victims and historic records. Even the U.S. thinks that it is too much for it to protect its junior ally.
					
					 We would like to question the Japanese government that if 200,000 Japanese women suffered the same disgrace, contempt and maltreatment as the Korean women did, what would be the feelings of the Japanese?
					
					 Japan's attitude toward the expression of the sexual slavery is a brigandish and shameless one just like a thief crying "stop the thief!" No country in the world is as shameless as Japan.
					
					 The world is set to terminate the inglorious past and open up a new era for reconciliation and cooperation. The ugly nature of Japan walking on a low moral ground being beset with crimes against humanity which it failed to settle is touching off resentment and accusation by all people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun S. Korean FM's Moves for Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen under Fire
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun S. Korean FM's Moves for Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Song Hwan, minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of south Korea, recently requested the U.S., Japan and other countries to join its moves for confrontation with the DPRK on the sidelines of the ASEAN Regional Security Forum. 
					 Rodong Sinmun in a bylined commentary Tuesday says in this regard:
					
					 Serious is his act of inciting confrontation against the DPRK even in the international arena, not satisfied with committing hideous terrorism against the DPRK.
					
					 Totally ungrounded was traitor Kim Song Hwan's talk about "change in the north's attitude" and "provocation and threat", who tried to curry favor with foreign forces.
					
					 If there were any provocation and threat on the Korean Peninsula, they come from foreign forces and the south Korean puppet regime in alignment with them against the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean regime stages war maneuvers almost every day in collusion with foreign forces, straining the situation. It even attempted at the heinous politically-motivated terrorist act, daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. 
					
					 Kim Song Hwan talked loudly of someone's "provocation and threat" while shelving south Korea's crimes.  This is shameless argument just like a thief crying "stop the thief!"
					
					 Minju Joson in a bylined commentary says: The regime tries to convince the public that it registered success at the ministerial meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum but this is aimed to mislead the public and bolster its failed policy for standoff with fellow countrymen with the help of the U.S. and Japan.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun History of Japan's Invasion of Korea Should Not be Allowed to Repeat Itself
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun History of Japan's Invasion of Korea Should Not be Allowed to Repeat Itself
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates a bylined article to the 105th anniversary of the illegal conclusion of the "Jongmi Seven-Point Treaty" by the Japanese imperialists. It stresses the history of Japan's invasion of Korea should not be allowed to repeat itself.
					 It continues:
					
					 The treaty was an illegal and invalid fraud document in the light of international law.
					
					 A treaty can become valid only when it is signed under the condition of equal sovereignty.
					
					 The conclusion of the "Ulsa Five-Point Treaty" deprived the Ri feudal Dynasty of diplomatic right which was taken over by Japan. The "Jongmi Seven-Point Treaty" signed under such situation was, in fact, an illegal one unilaterally produced by Japan.
					
					 Those who signed the seven-point treaty, governor Ito Hirobumi and premier Ri Wan Yong, were not invested with the right to sign international treaty nor were authorized by the state.
					
					 Ri Wan Yong demanded King Kojong ratify the draft treaty at the beck and call of the Japanese imperialists but the king flatly refused both signing and stamping the document with his Royal seal.
					
					 Under such situation, the Japanese imperialists announced that the treaty was concluded although it was stamped with only traitor Ri Wan Yong's seal.
					
					 With the signing of the treaty Japan took hold of the right of administration of Korea.
					
					 With nothing can it justify such crime committed through frauds and high-handed practices, the criminal act which can never be pardoned.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have now gone reckless to reinvade Korea. The Korean people will force the Japanese reactionaries to pay a dear price for the untold criminal acts committed by the Japanese imperialists after putting the whole of Korea under their control for nearly half a century in gangster-like ways.

articles.title: More Meetings Held to Congratulate Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
More Meetings Held to Congratulate Kim Jong Un 
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in North Hamgyong Province, Rason City and other cities (districts) and counties to congratulate the historic event in which the dear respected Kim Jong Un was awarded the title of DPRK Marshal.
					 Attending there were officials of the local party and power organs and working people's organizations and other people as well as youth and students.
					
					 Read out at the meetings was the relevant decision made by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the DPRK National Defence Commission and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 The speakers noted that the awarding of the title to Kim Jong Un was a striking manifestation of all the service personnel and people's absolute trust and loyalty to him who is ushering in the rosy future of powerful and prosperous Korea with his rare political ability and noble leadership traits.
					
					 They said that under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the WPK is shining as the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and a great heyday is being opened in strengthening the military strength with the socialist country displaying its dignity and mightiness as an impregnable power.
					
					 They called for firmly trusting and following Kim Jong Un only and becoming Songun revolutionary comrades who advance shoulder to shoulder and arm in arm with the same thinking and intention with him.
					
					 As long as there are his wise leadership and the single-minded unity of all the servicepersons and people, Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea will emerge invincible, they called on party members and other working people and youth and students to remain true to the leadership of the party.

articles.title: Flood Hinders Railway Transport in DPRK
articles.content:
Flood Hinders Railway Transport in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Downpour has brought big damage to the railway service in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 On July 23, the torrential rain washed away roadbed in several hundred-meter-long railway sections between Tongsin and Kaego and between Kaego and Jinphyong.
					
					 Earlier, a railway bridge between Jangphyong and Kimchaek was damaged and some parts of Tonsan-Paekgumsan railway section were buried by mudslides, affected by typhoon-7.
					
					 Over 10 000 cubic meters of mudslide fell on a section of Paekam-Taethaek railroad. 
					
					 The torrential rain left the communications with several railway stations paralyzed to make it impossible to get information about damage.
					
					 Reconstruction for the railway sections has begun to resume the train service.
					
					 Most of passenger and freight traffic relies on trains in the DPRK.

articles.title: Torrential Rains Hit Central Part of Korea
articles.content:
Torrential Rains Hit Central Part of Korea
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Downpour hit Pyongyang City and South and North Phyongan, Jagang, South Hamgyong and Kangwon provinces from Sunday evening to 09:00 Tuesday.
					 According to data available, 365 mm of rainfalls were registered in Songchon County, 276 mm in Sinyang County and 260 mm in Pukchang County, South Phyongan Province, 252 mm in Yodok County and 239 mm in Sudong District, South Hamgyong Province and 236 mm in Taegwan County, North Phyongan Province.
					
					 It also rained 199 mm and 185 mm respectively in Chonma and Tongchang counties, North Phyongan Province, 192 mm in Songwon County, Jagang Province and over 100 mm in other areas.
					
					 In particular, 60 mm of heavy rain fell in Huichon City, Jagang Province from 06:00 to 09:00 and 77 mm in Yodok County, South Hamgyong Province from 15:00 to 18:00 Monday and 40 mm in Pyongyang City from 00:00 to 01:00 and 141 mm in Songchon County, South Phyongan Province from 00:00 to 03:00 Tuesday.

articles.title: Collieries Affected by Flood in DPRK
articles.content:
Collieries Affected by Flood in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The recent flood has heavily affected collieries in the east coastal areas of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The flood swept over 2,000-meter-long embankment in the Soksong Coal Mine under the Myongchon Area Coal Mining Complex, leaving not a few dwelling houses submerged and five destroyed.
					
					 Hundreds of dwelling houses were submerged or crumbled in the Chonnae Area Coal Mining Complex. Nearly 1,000 tons of coal were washed away in Chonnae and Samchon coal mines respectively.
					
					 Many sections of railway, roads, conveyances and electric wires were battered by the flood. Mudslides hindered transport of coal.
					
					 The same holds true for collieries in Kowon area.
					
					 Follow-up measures are being taken to recover from flood damage.

articles.title: Russian Business Delegation Lays Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Russian Business Delegation Visits Liberation Tower 
						
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Russian Railways Company laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on Tuesday.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were members of the Russian delegation headed by its Senior Vice President Valery Reshetnikov, Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Timonin and other staff members of the Russian embassy here.
					
					 They placed the wreath before the tower in the name of the delegation before observing a moment's silence in honor of the martyrs of the Soviet Army who took part in battles to liberate Korea.
					
					 They went round the tower.

articles.title: Russian Business Delegation Visits Liberation Tower
articles.content:
Russian Business Delegation Visits Liberation Tower 
						
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Russian Railways Company laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on Tuesday.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were members of the Russian delegation headed by its Senior Vice President Valery Reshetnikov, Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Timonin and other staff members of the Russian embassy here.
					
					 They placed the wreath before the tower in the name of the delegation before observing a moment's silence in honor of the martyrs of the Soviet Army who took part in battles to liberate Korea.
					
					 They went round the tower.

articles.title: War-time Song Concert and Performance Celebrate Victory Day
articles.content:
War-time Song Concert and Performance Celebrate Victory Day
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers Tuesday gave a concert "Eternal Victory Day July 27" in Wonhwa-ri, Phyongwon County of South Phyongan Province to mark the 59th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 The concert began with poem and chorus "July 27, Our Victory Day". Put on the stage were colorful numbers like chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", chorus of war veterans "Song of National Defence", male vocal solo "For My Only Motherland" and light music for percussion instrument solo "Song of Coast Artillerymen."
					
					 The performers sang high praises of feats of President Kim Il Sung who visited Wonhwa-ri during the war to help farmers in sowing seeds and instill conviction of victory into them.
					
					 The art squad of the C.C., the Democratic Women's Union of Korea and its members gave a performance of wart-time songs "Songs of eternal war victory sang by women of Songun Korea" in front of the Fatherland Liberation War History Museum on Tuesday on the same occasion.
					
					 They highly praised the greatness of the President who doomed the U.S. imperialists to the fate of the sunset, thus winning victory in the war that would shine long in history.
					
					 Guitar ensemble "Yeppuni", serial songs "At the Spring Site", "Nobody Knows", "My Dear Has Become Hero" and "The Mill for Victory at Jikdong Pass" and other numbers deeply moved the spectators.

articles.title: Chinese Tourists Arrive by Pyongyang-Shanghai Route
articles.content:
Chinese Tourists Arrive by Pyongyang-Shanghai Route 
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- A tourist group of Shanghai region of China by Pyongyang-Shanghai international route arrived here Tuesday by air. It is headed by Feng Yiming, director general of the Chinese Shanghai International Tours Group, Co. Ltd.
					 It plans to tour Pyongyang, Kaesong and Mt. Myohyang.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of People's Security Leaves for China
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of People's Security Leaves for China 
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Ministry of People's Security headed by Minister Ri Myong Su left here Tuesday to visit China.

articles.title: DPRK Delegations Come Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegations Come Back Home 
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The DPRK film delegation returned home on Tuesday. It participated in the preview of the DPRK-China jointly-produced film "Promise in Pyongyang" held in China. Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture and director of the General Bureau of Film, headed the delegation.
					 Also coming back home Tuesday was the DPRK friendship delegation led by Ri Kil Chun, chairman of the Nampho City People's Committee which visited China.
					
					 Arriving here Tuesday is a delegation of the Asia-Pacific Broadcasting Union headed by President Kim In Gyu.

articles.title: Malawi President Hopes to Boost Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Malawi President Hopes to Boost Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Jo Yong Man, DPRK ambassador to Malawi, presented his credentials to Joyce Banda, president of Malawi, on July 18.
					 At the meeting the president expressed sincere thanks to the DPRK government for supporting the Malawi government's policy for people's wellbeing and socio-economic and political stability.
					
					 She said she was moved to see the Korean people meeting all challenges and successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders.
					
					 She wished the Korean people further success in their efforts for building a thriving nation and reunifying Korea under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 She hoped the relations of friendship and cooperation with the DPRK would grow stronger.

articles.title: New Service Facilities Built in Pyongyang
articles.content:
New Service Facilities Built in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- New cultural and public service facilities were built in Pyongyang before the 59th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War to be greeted as a grand festival.
					 New edifices which would contribute to the people's cultural life were built on the occasion of day of victory in the Fatherland Liberation War along with Changjon Street in Mansudae area where statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il stand.
					
					 The Rungna People's Pleasure Ground covering an area of nearly 100 hectares was created as a cultural recreation area so successfully as to win admiration even in the distant future.
					
					 The Rungna Dolphinarium has already drawn seawater from the West Sea of Korea and is ready to present acrobatic stunts of dolphins.
					
					 Fantastic amusement facilities in the above-said ground include the Rungna Wading Pool consisting of four-line water slides, shower bath site, diving tower while amazing service facilities include the Rungna Funfair that houses mad mouse, free fall, octopus merry-go-round, etc.
					
					 The Ryugyong Health Complex has taken its splendid and wonderful appearance being equipped with the ultra-modern service facilities including bathrooms, barber's shop, beauty salon, sporting room for medical care and amusement grounds.
					
					 There is also the People's Open-Air Ice Rink which will help school youth and children and other people to enjoy various kinds of ice sports including skating, ice-hockey, figure skating and speed skating in all seasons.
					
					 In the area of Mt. Taesong the Pyongyang Folk Park was successfully built as a grand open-air folk museum which would bring younger generation to the knowledge of the Korean nation's history spanning 5,000 years and its brilliant cultural tradition.
					
					 It houses more than 80 major historical relics in their actual size or in miniature. Among them are the Mausoleum of King Tangun and King Tongmyong's Mausoleum, graves of historical persons, towers in Kumgang Temple, Miruk Temple and Hwangryong Temple, dolmen, pipha-shaped dagger, Korean udometer, turtle-shaped armored ship and the monument to the victory in the battle in the northern area of Korea.
					
					 Miniatures of buildings dating back to the periods of Koguryo and Palhae were also built in districts of folk villages covering tens of thousands of square meters, which would serve as a reminder of the high architecture of Korean ancestors.
					
					 The Pyongyang Vegetable Science Institute and the Pyongyang Floriculture Institute were renovated on an expansion basis with new hundreds of greenhouses in areas covering a hundred and scores of hectares, turning into large-scale bases for research and production of vegetable and cultivation of flowering plants.
					
					 New appearance of Pyongyang suited to the capital of the powerful and prosperous DPRK is a fruition of the policy of loving the people pursued by leader Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul to build a socialist country where the people would enjoy a happy life down through generations, undergoing all sorts of hardships for the people, and by the dear respected Kim Jong Un who dedicates himself to them with patriotism.

articles.title: War Veterans to Participate in Celebrations of V-Day
articles.content:
War Veterans to Participate in Celebrations of V-Day
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- War veterans in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea will participate in the celebrations of victory day, due in Pyongyang on the initiative of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 The veterans made contributions to winning the war (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953) against the U.S. imperialists boasting themselves of the world's "strongest", by displaying the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the fatherland under the wise command of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					 With a strong sense of moral obligation, Generalissimo Kim Jong Il took care of them as the second generation of the Korean revolution and revolutionary forerunners.
					
					 Young people in the DPRK have deeply respected and looked after the war veterans, true to the intention of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 This time, Kim Jong Un took a measure to significantly organize the celebrations in such a way as glorifying their precious feats and fighting spirit for all ages.
					
					 In response to his measure, local party, government and social bodies have made with sincerity the preparations for the participation of those selected as delegates to the celebrations.
					
					 With days ahead of the celebrations, the capital city of Pyongyang is now seized with festive mood to welcome the war veterans who devotedly fought for the freedom of the country and happiness of the people.

articles.title: Attempt to Break Unity of DPRK Society Flailed
articles.content:
Attempt to Break Unity of DPRK Society Flailed
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- It was recently disclosed that the United States and the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea were making desperate efforts to remove the mental mainstay of the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 In this regard the Korean people have condemned their futile anti-DPRK plot.
					
					 Ri Yong Il, a section chief at the Secretariat of the C.C., Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, told KCNA:
					
					 "We should show no mercy to the enemies attempting to attack the dignity of our supreme leadership, an act of mangling our hearts.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are saviors of the nation and the eternal lodestar of national reunification whom all the Korean people hold in high esteem as the sun for their destiny. Their statues and monuments erected everywhere in the country are associated with all Koreans' sincerity and will to hand down through generations the great feats of the peerlessly great persons for the nation and the world people.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' attempted subversive acts are a never-to-be-condoned hideous crime."
					
					 Son Kwang Sop, rector of Kanggye University of Education No. 2, said:
					
					 "The DPRK people would unhesitatingly go through fire and water to protect portraits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il from damage, entrusting their destiny and future to them.
					
					 It is our unshakable faith and will to regard and follow the great persons as our mental mainstay and the sun for our life."
					
					 U Tu Thae, manager of the Munphyong Smeltery, said:
					
					 "Our army and people will firmly defend Korean-style socialism at the cost of our lives from the enemy's politically motivated terrorist acts.
					
					 The south Korean group of traitors is well advised to renounce foolish attempts to break the single-minded unity of our society."

articles.title: Buddhist Picture, Cultural Legacy of Korea
articles.content:
Buddhist Picture, Cultural Legacy of Korea
						
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The cultural legacies of Korea include Buddhist picture, which made contribution to developing the techniques of Korean painting.
					 This picture well shows features of the Korean painting technique through skillful combination of traditional line drawing technique and color display.
					
					 Most of the pictures of this kind are based on the excellent techniques of Korean painting such as telling yet delicate touch. They left much to be desired in content and form, but successfully represented the artistic talent and affect of ancestors and national feelings.
					
					 Typical of them are pictures displayed at Ryangchon, Kaesim and Wonmyong temples in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

articles.title: General Strikes Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
General Strikes Unabated in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Most of trade unions of south Korea reportedly are on general strikes in succession.
					 The trade union of the metal workers kicked off a general strike on July 20 in the wake of its general strike of more than 130,000 union members demanding ban on the night work and repeal of part-time job system on July 13.
					
					 Earlier, the construction trade union and the Freight Workers' Solidarity under the south Korean transport workers' union went on the similar strikes.
					
					 The railway, airport, harbor and transport trade unions also refused to accept the authorities' demand for proxy transport in support of more than 300,000 unionists of the Solidarity which declared the general strike on an indefinite strike.
					
					 The financial union also manifested its will to launch a general strike.
					
					 All the participants in the strikes are crying out for a boost in pay, application of the 8-hour work system, repeal of part-time job system and the withdrawal of the layoff measures.
					
					 Such massive protests are an eruption of the wrath and grudge against the south Korean conservative ruling forces who exploit and oppress the working people while imposing the unemployment and poverty upon them by enforcing the unpopular economic policy.
					
					 According to data available, 2 114 workers were reported to have lost their lives and over 93 290 wounded in south Korea last year, due to labor accidents.
					
					 The part-timers in south Korea are constantly subject to discrimination no matter how hard they work and they are living fearful of the unemployment. This clearly shows the reactionary nature of the labor policy trumpeted by the south Korean puppet regime.
					
					 What is more serious is that the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors concluded without hesitation the "Free Trade Agreement" with the U.S. in the end, leaving the south Korean economy to the mercy of foreign forces, a sycophantic act of treachery of making the people's living harder.
					
					 It is quite natural to see the general strikes against the traitorous regime's unpopular rule.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" is repeating what traitor Lee committed by deceiving the people and committing treacherous actions.
					
					 The south Korean people are unanimous in saying that the "economic democracy" and "people's happiness" trumpeted by the party of traitors are little different from the deceptive commitment made by the Lee group to "recover economy" that resulted in the bankruptcy of the economy, the deterioration of the people's livelihood, the social inequality and widened gap between the rich and the poor.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Army Plan Joint Military Drill for Aggression
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea Plan Joint Military Drill 
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. forces and the south Korean puppet army are planning to stage Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercise against the DPRK from August 20 to 31, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 Involved in the drill will be about 30,000-strong U.S. imperialist aggressor forces, including those overseas, and huge troops of all army corps, fleet commands and those above the air division level of the puppet army.
					
					 The warmongers are contemplating putting into it military personnel of different countries who took part in the past Korean war under the helmet of "UN forces."
					
					 The alleged annual drill is staged with the mobilization of all kinds of latest nuclear war hardware and huge aggression forces and civilians with the whole of south Korea as an operation theater. This is apparently a war maneuver aimed to invade the DPRK.

articles.title: Western Media Should Be Impartial: U.K. Newspaper
articles.content:
Western Media Should Be Impartial: U.K. Newspaper 
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The U.K. newspaper Guardian on July 19 carried an article criticizing unfair reports spread by the Western media. 
					 The paper said a shocking scene played out at Panmunjom in the demilitarized zone between North and South Korea. Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, was thrown to the ground and carried off in a headlock by the south Korean regime in early July. Ro visited Pyongyang to pay respects at ceremonies to mark the 100th day after the death of general secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 It said: 
					
					 The arrest made a very small splash in the western media, because it didn't square easily with the message that has been delivered by media outlets in Europe and the U.S. for the last two decades. 
					
					 In fact it is almost impossible to find any piece of positive European journalism relating to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.  
					
					 The lack of western sources in north Korea has allowed the media to conjure up fantastic stories that enthrall readers but aren't grounded in hard fact.
					
					 These roles are dusted off whenever there are flare-ups. 
					
					 When the south Korean navy ship, the Cheonan, sank on March 26, 2010, the south Koreans accused their neighbours of having fired a torpedo. A detailed rebuttal by North Korea's military was disregarded by the wider world, as was the offer to aid an open investigation.
					
					 The south Korean public wasn't widely convinced of north Korean involvement
					
					 While north Korean actions are condemned and derided, very few column inches are devoted to scrutiny of south Korea's "president" Lee Myung-bak and his oppressive policies. 
					
					 They prosecute anyone speaking in favour of north Korea or communism in general. There are frequent reports of detention without trial, human rights abuses and clampdowns on freedom of speech. 
					
					Whatever your view on the actions of north and south Korea's governments, the hypocrisy of using one-sided journalism to label north Korea a rogue, propaganda-led state is surely self-evident and fans the fire of intolerance and animosity. 
					
					  The Korean divide is a complex, multi-faceted political situation. Nobody benefits from turning it into a moral melodrama and we should demand more from our supposedly impartial media.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Polish Internet Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Polish Internet Website
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- The Polish Internet website "The DPRK" carried the full text of general secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" on July 17.
					 The work, published on August 4, 1997, deals with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for national reunification and formulates the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and sets forth tasks and ways for national reunification on their basis.

articles.title: Remembrance Meeting for Kim Il Sung Held in Russia
articles.content:
Remembrance Meeting for Kim Il Sung Held in Russia
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting was held in Blagobeshensk City of Russia on July 13 to mark the 18th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were personages of the Russian Blagobeshensk Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and Blagobeshensk State University of Education and other people.
					
					 A. I. Donchenko, chairman of the association, said the President was the greatest man and an illustrious leader in the 20th century who performed exploits for Korean revolution and global independence.
					
					 He elaborated on the main content of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People".

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered by Syrian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered by Syrian Figure
 Pyongyang, July 24 (KCNA) -- Saber Ballul, head of a chair of the Political Faculty of the University of Damascus in Syria, made public a statement on July 8, the 18th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 He said the President is deeply remembered by the progressives in every July as he was an ideological and theoretical genius who founded the Juche idea, Songun idea.
					
					 The Juche idea and Songun idea serve as the great guiding ideas indicating the bright way for the Korean people and the progressives of the world, he said, and went on:
					
					 The President was not only a benevolent father of the people who turned Korea into a Juche land of bliss under socialism but a great leader who honored the 20th century as the independent one by sagaciously leading the Korean revolution and global independence.
					
					 As there is the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the revolutionary cause of the President and leader Kim Jong Il generation after generation, the future of the DPRK will be brighter.
					
					 We look up to Juche Korea as the beacon of hope, he said, wishing the Korean people only victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae visita el Parque Folclorico de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae visita el Parque Folclorico de Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, 24 de julio (ACNC) -- El jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, quien es miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, averiguo en el terreno el estado de construccion del Parque Folclorico de Pyongyang a punto de inauguracion.
					 En acato a la noble concepcion del pueblo del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un, los constructores militares trabajaron intensamente para edificar el parque como creacion monumental de la era del Songun.
					
					 Recorriendo varios puntos del parque, Choe estimulo los exitos de constructores uniformados que realizaron milagros e innovaciones con el espiritu de ataque "De un tiron".
					
					 Destaco a ellos la necesidad de concluir en el periodo previsto las obras encargadas al materializar a toda costa las tareas asignadas por el Comandante Supremo.
					
					 Con anterioridad, Choe Ryong Hae visito la Academia de Ciencias Agricolas donde debatio los remedios para elevar mas la eficiencia de la instalacion generadora del gas metano y usar ampliamente las fuentes de energias renovables.

articles.title: Continuan actos festivos en la RPDC
articles.content:
Continuan actos festivos en la RPDC
 Pyongyang, 24 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar en la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, las ciudades (o municipios) inclusive la de Rason y los distritos los mitines para festejar el otorgamiento al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un del titulo del mariscal de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 Estuvieron presentes en las ocasiones los funcionarios de las instituciones locales del Partido y el Poder, las entidades de masas, los trabajadores y los jovenes y estudiantes locales.
					
					 Se dio lectura a la resolucion correspondiente del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite de Defensa Nacional y el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, de la RPDC.
					
					 Seguidamente, hubo intervenciones.
					
					 Los oradores subrayaron que la concesion al Maximo Dirigente del titulo del mariscal es la expresion de absoluta confianza y fidelidad de todo el ejercito y el pueblo a ese gran hombre sin par quien forja el futuro radiante de la Corea prospera con su extraordinaria capacidad politica y noble modo de direccion.
					
					 Bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, el Partido del Trabajo de Corea brilla como partido glorioso del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, se abre la era dorada para el fortalecimiento del poderio militar y la patria socialista exalta a todo el mundo su dignidad y aspecto majestuoso como potencia invencible, apuntaron.
					
					  Todos deben ser camaradas revolucionarios del Songun que marchen brazo a brazo y hombro a hombro con el Maximo Dirigente compartiendo la idea y el proposito, senalaron.
					
					  Al final, destacaron que todos los militantes del partido, los trabajadores, los jovenes y estudiantes deben apoyar fielmente la direccion del PTC, afirmando que la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il es invencible gracias a la sabia direccion de Kim Jong Un y la unidad monolitica de todo el ejercito y el pueblo.

articles.title: No se acepta dualismo en aplicacion de penas a terroristas: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
No se acepta dualismo en aplicacion de penas a terroristas: comentario de ACNC
 Pyongyang, 24 de julio (ACNC) -- Ahora Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea se hacen desentendidos del grave atentado de terrorismo politico de Estado que idearon e intentaron juntos contra la RPDC, pese a las declaraciones confirmatorias de los involucrados en el caso.
					 Instigando a los organos de inteligencia del Sur de Corea, EE.UU. hizo organizar con una chusma la entidad que se dedica a la destruccion de las estatuas de bronce de la RPDC.
					
					 Ademas, intervino directa y minuciosamente en todo el curso del incidente entregando a esa entidad muchos fondos y medios de sabotaje y aprobando el plan de atentado.
					
					 Resulta ilogico que unos individuos miserables como fugitivos norcoreanos inmorales y parasitarios hayan intentado a solas una "accion" tan grave como la destruccion de las estatuas de bronce de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu, erigidas en la RPDC.
					
					 La sociedad internacional tiene aversion al comportamiento de dos caras de EE.UU. que libra una febril "guerra antiterrorista" por una parte y por la otra, se ofrece nuevamente como manipulador del atentado terrorista contra la maxima dignidad de un Estado soberano.
					
					 Segun datos, en el Estado de Florida se realiza ordinariamente la reunion sobre la operacion especial de EE.UU.
					
					 En el reciente encuentro de introduccion de las circunstancias de la misma reunion, un general de brigada de la fuerza terrestre de EE.UU. hizo mencion de la importancia de las actividades de espionaje que se desarrollan en el interior de Corea.
					
					 Continuo que la unidad especial de EE.UU. inicio ya la recogida de informaciones en Corea.
					
					 Tras organizar una unidad de accion especial llamada el departamento secreto de defensa adscrito a la Agencia de Inteligencia de Defensa, el Departamento de Defensa de Estados Unidos intensifica la recogida de informaciones en las afueras de las zonas en guerra.
					
					 Se considera que los primeros blancos del nuevo aparato son Corea, Iran, China y otros paises.
					
					 Segun un funcionario del Pentagono, ese organo obtendra las informaciones necesarias ubicando a sus agentes en las posiciones deseadas en cooperacion con la CIA.
					
					 Esa actividad de inteligencia se conocio hace varios anos al revelarse el plan de accion del Departamento de Defensa.
					
					 EE.UU. concentra en las zonas fronterizas con Corea a sus agentes que difundiran los rumores falsos en el interior de la segunda para generar disturbios y "conflictos internos".
					
					 EE.UU. desembolsa cada ano enormes fondos del presupuesto estatal para financiar a las entidades intrigantes anti-RPDC, de modo que se ampliaran gradualmente las operaciones psicologicas y subversivas.
					
					 El recien descubierto caso de terrorismo es la continuacion de tal politica de EE.UU. sobre la RPDC.
					
					 La ley antiterrorista internacional se compone de los convenios regionales e internacionales para prohibir y castigar los actos terroristas, el uso de explosivos y el suministro de fondos para ese fin.
					
					 En los convenios se citan como manifestaciones de terrorismo internacional la violencia o la amenaza con usarla contra la vida y la salud de las figuras importantes del gobierno o el circulo social, inclusive el jefe del estado, la destruccion y el sabotaje de los bienes comunes del Estado y el uso de armas de fuego, explosivos y sustancias toxicas en la violencia indiscriminada.
					
					 Tales acciones son crimenes de terrorismo internacional que deben ser castigados severamente y a sus ejecutores no se aplica la prescripcion.
					
					 EE.UU. debe respetar sin falta la ley antiterrorista internacional y no puede eludir las responsabilidades del presente caso.
					
					 Debe reconocer la gravedad del caso y pedir disculpas oficialmente a la RPDC.
					
					 Al mismo tiempo, ha de castigar a los delincuentes responsables.
					
					 Si EE.UU. establece la pauta de doble rasero en el castigo a los terroristas, eso fomentara los atentados terroristas que perturbaran la seguridad del mismo territorio estadounidense y la paz del mundo.

articles.title: Siguen condenando el atentado terrorista contra sosten espiritual
articles.content:
Siguen condenando el atentado terrorista contra sosten espiritual
 Pyongyang, 24 de julio (ACNC) -- A traves de la reciente conferencia de prensa con el terrorista detenido, Jon Yong Chol, se conocio que Estados Unidos y la banda de Lee Myung Bak enfocan su ofensiva anti-RPDC en la destruccion del sosten espiritual del pueblo coreano que confia y sigue a su lider considerandolo como cielo.
					 Entrevistado con la ACNC, el jefe de departamento del Secretariado del Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria, Ri Yong Il, expreso como sigue:
					
					 No puedo perdonar jamas a esos enemigos que intentaron el sabotaje contra la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					 Los Grandes Hombres del monte Paektu son salvadores de la nacion y eternos luceros de la reunificacion de la patria en que todo el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea confian su destino. En las estatuas de bronce y los grandes monumentos erguidos por doquier del pais se refleja el deseo de nuestro pueblo de eternizar las inmortales hazanas acumuladas por ellos ante la nacion y la humanidad.
					
					 La banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak nos pagara sin falta su atentado terrorista de mayor gravedad contra las sagradas estatuas de bronce.
					
					 El rector de la Universidad Pedagogica no. 2 de Kanggye, Son Kwang Sop:
					
					 Todos los militares y civiles de nuestro pais protegen a costa de la vida los retratos de los Grandes Hombres en cualesquier circunstancias como incendio y naufragio porque consideran que sin ellos no habria el destino ni futuro.
					
					 Aunque los imperialistas norteamericanos y los traidores surcoreanos maniobran con desesperacion contra la RPDC, nuestros militares y civiles guardaran mas profundamente en su corazon tal sosten espiritual.
					
					 El gerente de la Fundicion de Metales no Ferrosos de Munphyong, U Tu Thae:
					
					 La banda surcoreana trata estupidamente de enturbiar la opinion publica y socavar la unidad monolitica de la RPDC a traves de las sucias operaciones como el descubierto caso de terrorismo politico.
					
					 La defensa a ultranza al lider es nuestra conviccion inconmovible.
					
					 Nuestros militares y civiles se mantienen movilizados y alertos para defender el socialismo a costa de la vida desde las repugnantes conspiraciones de los enemigos que persiguen ambiciones irrealizables.

articles.title: Caen en la parte centrica de Corea lluvias torrenciales
articles.content:
Caen en la parte centrica de Corea lluvias torrenciales
 Pyongyang, 24 de julio (ACNC) -- Desde la noche del dia 22 hasta las 9:00 del 24, en la ciudad de Pyongyang y algunas regiones de las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur y el Norte, Jagang, Hamgyong del Sur y Kangwon, cayeron las lluvias torrenciales.
					 Segun estadistica, la precipitacion se registro en los distritos Songchon, Sinyang y Pukchang de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur 365mm, 276mm y 260mm respectivamente, mientras, el distrito de  Yodok y la comunidad de Sudong, de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur 252mm y 239mm;  en el distrito de Taegwan  de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, 236mm.
					
					 Y el pluviometro marco 199mm y 185mm en los distritos de Chonma y Tongchang de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, 192mm en el distrito de Songwon de la provincia de Jagang y mas de 100mm en mas de 20 regiones.
					
					 Sobre todo,  entre las 6:00 y las 9:00 del dia 23, la precipitacion marco 60mm en la ciudad de Huichon de la provincia de Jagang y 77mm en el distrito de Yodok de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, desde las 0:00 hasta las 1:00 del dia 24, 40mm en la ciudad de Pyongyang y desde las 0:00 hasta las 3:00, 141mm en el distrito de Songchon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
